mapper.sql: SELECT STORE_NO, STORE_WRITERNO, STORE_KORNAME, STORE_ENGNAME, STORE_ADDRESS, STORE_PHONE, STORE_TIME, STORE_TYPE, STORE_IMGURL, STORE_STATUS, STORE_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM BBN_STORE WHERE STORE_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select:
AND STORE_TYPE = #{shCate}
AND STORE_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{shRegionD1} || '%'
AND STORE_KORNAME LIKE '%' || #{shKeyword} || '%' OR STORE_ENGNAME LIKE '%' || #{shKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY STORE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBN_STORE ( STORE_NO, STORE_WRITERNO, STORE_KORNAME, STORE_ENGNAME, STORE_ADDRESS, STORE_PHONE, STORE_TIME, STORE_TYPE, STORE_IMGURL, STORE_STATUS, STORE_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_STORE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{writerNo}, #{korBname}, #{engBname}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{bnsHour}, #{type}, #{imgUrl}, DEFAULT, #{content}, #{originalFileName}, #{renamedFileName}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
